DocAttribute.Name: Axis
DocAttribute.Documentation: The exact direction of the local Z Axis.

DocAttribute.Name: RefDirection
DocAttribute.Documentation: The direction used to determine the direction of the local X Axis. If necessary an adjustment is made to maintain orthogonality to the Axis direction. If Axis and/or RefDirection is omitted, these directions are taken from the geometric coordinate system.

DocAttribute.Name: P
DocAttribute.Documentation: The normalized directions of the placement X Axis (P[1]) and the placement Y Axis (P[2]) and the placement Z Axis (P[3]).

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The dimensionality of the placement location shall be 3.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The Axis when given should only reference a three-dimensional IfcDirection.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR3
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The RefDirection when given should only reference a three-dimensional IfcDirection.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR4
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The Axis and RefDirection shall not be parallel or anti-parallel.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR5
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either both (Axis and RefDirection) are not given and therefore defaulted, or both shall be given. This is a further constraint in IFC Release 1.5.
